channel.title: Shoko Changelog on Shoko Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Shoko Changelog on Shoko Docs

item.title: Shoko Desktop Changelog
item.description: The Shoko Desktop Changelog is automatically outputted. To update it, please edit the desktop.json file in data/changelog.

item.title: Shoko Server Changelog
item.description: The Shoko Server Changelog is automatically outputted. To update it, please edit the server.json file in data/changelog.

item.title: My Anime 3 Changelog
item.description: The My Anime 3 Changelog is automatically outputted. To update it, please edit the myanime3.json file in data/changelog.

item.title: Shoko on Plex Changelog
item.description: The Shoko on Plex Changelog is automatically outputted. To update it, please edit the plex.json file in data/changelog.
